body.name: BERIBES Upgraded Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones with Transparent Modes,65H Playtime Wireless Bluetooth with Mic, Deep Bass,3.5MM Cable,Soft-Earpads,Fast Charging-Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 9 mins
features: 1, 【Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) ,Transparent Mode】: Professional advanced noise cancellation silences up to 95% of machine noise. "Transparent Mode" This feature lets in ambient noise, so you can easily hear announcements on a bus or subway, or listen to what's happening around you without removing the active noise cancelling headphones. The sensitive buttons control makes it easy to switch between this two modes.

2,【Up to 65 hours of playtime, Fast charging】: Enjoy up to 40 hours of music in noise cancelling mode, or extend the playtime to 65 hours in standard mode. A quick 5-minute charge gives you 4 hours of listening. You can charge it through the Type-C port, or use a 3.5mm audio cable for a wired connection.Note: If you are not using the over-ear wireless headphones in Bluetooth mode, please turn off ANC to conserve power.

3,【Premium sound quality, Deep Bass】: The 40mm drivers reproduce a full range of frequencies, providing deep, powerful, and immersive sound at any volume. BERIBES headphones wireless buetooth have always been committed to providing our customers with better sound quality as the focal point of our engineering. Our goal is to provide our customers with the best possible sound quality.

4,【Unique foldable, Lightweight, Ergonomic design】: The professional-grade protein ear-pads, 90° inward rotation, and 120°inward folding ear-cups are lightweight (only 0.8 lb) for maximum comfort during long periods of use. The bluetooth headphones with microphone fold compactly for easy storage when traveling. The ergonomic structure and multi-level adjustable headband provide a comfortable fit for all users.

5,【Bluetooth headset , After Sale Protection】: Package includes ANC Noise Cancellation Bluetooth headphones,3.5mm backup audio cable, USB charging cable, and User Manual. We will provide a 30-day return and 12-month warranty, lifetime worry-free user support, contact us anytime if you have any questions about the product, and we will reply within 10 hours
body.description: BERIBES Upgraded WH305B Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones Active Noise Cancelling: BERIBES Noise cancelling headphones with 95% ambient noise reduction for a peaceful listening experience in crowded environments.Transparent Mode: This allows you to hear and interact with ambient noise while wearing the headphones. This feature is great for hearing announcements on trains or subways, or simply staying aware of your surroundings without removing the headphones. The sensitive touch control makes it easy to switch between this mode and our ANC feature. Wirless Bluetooth 5.3/Wired 3.5MM Audio Cable USB Type-C Quick Charge/Long Battery Life Adjustable headband/Comfortable Earcups Exceptional Music Clarity/Built-in microphone

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Your Favorite Music Like Never Before, With These Exquisite Noise Cancelling Headphones Brought To You By BERIBES ! The BERIBES ANC Bluetooth headphones will give you a deep, powerful, and immersive sound at any volume, make your overall listening experience just that much better. Our goal has always been committed to providing our customers with better sound quality as the focal point of our engineering. Are you looking for a high-end quality pair of headphones over ear to enjoy your music, movies, and games? Have you tried similar products in the past but were let down by how flimsy they were or by how quickly they stopped working? Would you opt for an earphone set that is durable, heavy duty, and doesn’t cost you a month’s salary? If so, then this is your lucky day, because BERIBES has just the thing you’re looking for!

Included Components： BERIBES ANC/Transparent Mode Headphones *1 USB Type-C Charging Cable *1 3.5 mm AUX Cable *1 User Manual *1 BERIBES Upgraded WH305B Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones Active Noise Cancelling: BERIBES Noise cancelling headphones with 95% ambient noise reduction for a peaceful listening experience in crowded environments.Transparent Mode: This allows you to hear and interact with ambient noise while wearing the headphones. This feature is great for hearing announcements on trains or subways, or simply staying aware of your surroundings without removing the headphones. The sensitive touch control makes it easy to switch between this mode and our ANC feature. Wirless Bluetooth 5.3/Wired 3.5MM Audio Cable USB Type-C Quick Charge/Long Battery Life Adjustable headband/Comfortable Earcups Exceptional Music Clarity/Built-in microphone
Notice: Long press for volume up and down, click for next or previous track

Universal Compatibility BERIBES Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones are compatible with Bluetooth-enabled devices like Bluetooth phones, tablets, laptop computers,MP3/4 and more. NOTE: You need a separate Bluetooth Transmitter when connecting the wirless headphones to the devices without built-in Bluetooth. Multi-Point Connection (Max: Two Devices) 1. Make sure the over-ear headphones have been connected to the first Bluetooth device successfully. 2. Turn off the first device's Bluetooth. 3. Turn on the second device's Bluetooth, find the "WH305B” and select it to pair with your device. 4. Turn on the first device's Bluetooth and select "WH305B" to pair it again. now your headset is connected to the 2 devices at the same time. (If you do not need to use at the same time, you can turn off one of the Bluetooth connection) ANC/Transparency Mode ANC MODE Whether you’re commuting on the subway, or escaping the distractions of bus or train, The active noise canceling effectively block out background noise up to 28dB, so all you hear is your music. TRANSPARENCY MODE It allows you to hear the live sounds around you - the voices of your colleagues, subway announcements and street traffic - while you still enjoy the music at the same time.

Space-saving design for Easy to Carry in a Bag Thanks to their lightweight and collapsible design, BERIBES noise cancelling headphones weigh only 0.8 lbs and take little storage space. the space-saving headset can be easily folded up and stored in bags or suitcases. Give yourself a good mood during the trip. Crystal Clear Calls A high-quality Microphone built-in enables you to one-click to take a call, which ensures you have clear calls hands-free anytime and anywhere, and it is much more convenient to free yourself from wires, and Perfect for when you’re working from home, taking online classes or traveling . Wireless and wired mode Wireless mode set you free from tangled cables. offering the fastest Audio transmission with excellent stability. If it runs out of power, Included audio cable helps you continue to enjoy music without electricity, with unlimited access to immersive sound at any time.

How to connect noise canceling headphones wirelessly by Bluetooth? How to connect headphones wirelessly by Bluetooth? < First connection pairing > : Long press the "O" key for 4 seconds, hear "power on", until the red and blue lights flash alternately, enter the Bluetooth pairing mode, hear "Pairing", then open the Bluetooth setting of the device you want to use, find the Bluetooth pairing named "WH305B" and click "Connect"; < If reconnected to use > : Long press the "O" key for 2 seconds, hear "power on", the blue light flashes, enter the Bluetooth automatic connection mode, hear "connected", you can connect the Bluetooth device used before; Or when there is a red and blue light flashing, click the "O" button again, you can also automatically connect back to the previously connected Bluetooth device (hear "connected"). (Note: If Bluetooth is not found in the above operation, the headset is off, long press the MFB (O) key for 10S, hear 'dududu', the red and blue light flashes three times at the same time, the headset will automatically enter the pairing state , and then turn on the Bluetooth device to search for pairing and connection again.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, comfortable noise cancelling headset.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I thought I'd give it a try. It's great! Has 3 sound settings. Noise cancelling - which does a very good job. A listening mode - which allows ambient sounds to come in through headphones. You can use this to talk/listen without taking headset off. 3rd - off, though it does offer some sound blocking.I've used top-of-the-line noise cancelling headsets. They're great, but very expensive. This item compares very well to the top models. Not quite as good, but darn close. This one is adjustable, lightweight and comfortable.The audio quality is very good. A very minor complaint: I'd like to be able to turn the volume up a little higher, as it tops out below my 'blast a good song' desired setting. But, it's probably better for my hearing in the long run anyway. Blue tooth paring worked with my iPhone easily. No cord to fuss with. But if you have a device without blue tooth, there IS a cord option, a nice featureCharged it up and used this on 3 1/2 hour flights, plus airport waiting use, round trip. Never had to charge it during trip. Ear cushion speakers fold in to make it easier to pack away. I would have liked a carry case, but that would raise the price - and I was able to use a different case I had anyway.Great for travel, or home use. Very nice, economical ANR headset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a great price
reviews.reviewText: Great sound and comfort. My ears get a little sore after using them for more than a few hours but overall very comfortable. I carry them loosely in a backpack and they hold up well amongst all the other stuff in my bag. I like that I can manage how much outside noise I can hear as well. Great price for a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this item, the headphones sounds great and feel amazing. The o key thing I don’t like is that the active noise canceling isn’t that great, but it works decently, so overall pretty great item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like these headphones
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been pleasantly surprised by these headphones. Use them when my wife goes to sleep. Wanted something that would last longer at a sitting than some earbuds I already had and constantly had to recharge. So many choices but these were relatively less expensive to start, and then they were on sale on top of that. So, I figured it wasn’t too big of an investment if I got it wrong. But again, I’ve been pleasantly surprised. I’m not an audiophile, but I think they produce good sound with good range. They’ve also provided solid Bluetooth connectivity and range. One thing I was wary of from reading reviews for other brand headphones was durability. Others warned that other brands broke too easily. And while mine enjoy an easy, gentle, home-based life, they’ve given me no reason to think that they will turn out to be fragile in the long run. I’ve also been happy with the battery life between charging. Way better than the old earbuds. Even though I choose to use them on a setting that is not meant to produce the longest duration between charges that these headphones should be capable of, I still get approximately 34 hours on a single charge, which is fantastic to me. Overall, I am pleased and feel like I got good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good performance and ease of use at a low price
reviews.reviewText: I am professional web Broadcaster and s mobile DJ and very fussy about clean sound so I have some pretty good audio equipment at home. In this case I was looking for a wireless headset to use at my regular job to block out the loud white noise sound of a massive air conditioner in my work area (and the constant bothersome negativity and complaining of the guy next to me). I was also shopping for an inexpensive one that has some active noise cancelling without paying close to $400. For this low price, this one is surprisingly very good with clean sound, good deep bass without being too loud, and no audio distortion. Bluetooth connects easily and quickly to my computer and cell phone and it is easy to operate. Battery life is outstanding. It has a good range with no distortion so I can walk away with no loss of sound quality (have not tested the actual max distance which will vary anyway by device). The noise cancelling works as indicated and blocks a good amount of external noise, besides, with music it sounds amazingly detailed without awareness of loud external noises It is very comfortable, lightweight and not too tight. The mic is pretty decent and I can be clearly understood on calls. The build feels good. I definitely recommend it a good work and travel companion, and for personal daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mediocre headphones sound mediocre
reviews.reviewText: Once in a while you get a bargain with a set of good sounding, budget priced, headphones. Well, these were on sale… and they looked pretty cool, so why not give them a try. I wasn’t expecting a whole lot of amazement i would let these… make their own statement and see what else they offered. I’m glad I bought them on sale. But first things first. They look expensive from a far and can come across aesthetically. But they’re cheap. The build is solid but a lot of plastic parts. So durability will be very questionable. Ear cushions are the best thing. Second the sound is …. Not poor but leaves a lot to be desired. Muddled high end and lacks bass punch. I’ll break them in and see if that gets better. ANC is very good at this price point. The price point is very low. Overall.. the 3 stars is generous. I’d recommend TOZOs over these. If you want cheap headphones that pack a punch for the money. These will probably be on static display…. For me, decorating the music room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: No need to spend $300 + on noise-cancelling headphones. Or even $200, or $100. The BERIBES is more than adequate for airplane travel. Connect to your phone via Bluetooth and listen to music, not engine hum or screaming kids. Great for sitting in an airport relaxing with or without music between flights. Also great for making phone calls in an airport. You are hands-free without the background noise. Very light with soft foam. Recommend it to anyone who travels by airplane.
The media could not be loaded. Los compré para ver si eran lo que decían que son buenos y bonitos y la verdad si me gustaron mucho los volvería a comprar 👍

reviews.reviewTitle: Wird seit 1 Jahr fast täglich benutzt! Top!
reviews.reviewText: Für den Preis absolut Top! Ich benutze es seit 1 Jahr fast jeden Tag über mehrere Stunden und es funktionierte immer noch ohne Probleme. Der Akku hält ewig, die Verbindung funktioniert problemlos und die Klangqualität ist auch gut. Wer günstige und langlebige Kopfhörer sucht, absolute Empfehlung. Ich habe sie in rosa und sie sehen auch sehr schön aus und sitzen total bequem!

Unos auriculares geniales, de calidad, buen sonido, emparejan rápido, en la cabeza te encajan muy bien, no te bailan como otros, la batería dura perfectamente las 65h, son de lo mejorcito que hay ahora, mirando precio y calidad.

En la publicidad menciona bajos profundos y se escuchan todos planos, mejor busquen los soundpeats A6 esos si tienen bajos profundos, tienen el mismo precio y no tardan una semana en llegar, ahora a esperar 30 dias para ver mi dinero de regreso.
Molto comode, si collega subito sui dispositivi, suono buono, anche in chiamata verso cellulare voce chiara e sì sente bene.
